org.raistlic.common.config.core

Interface Config

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigManager, MutableConfig
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMutableConfigDecorator

    public interface Config
extends ConfigSource
    The interface abstracts the functionality of a configuration entity instance, which include queries to multiple types of values using String key.
    Since:
    1.0

      • Methods inherited from interface org.raistlic.common.config.source.ConfigSource

        getKeys, getString, hasKey

    • Method Detail

      • getString

        default java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.String value)
        The method queries the String value specified by the key .
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        value - the default value to return in case key is not found.
        Returns:
        the value in the Config specified by key , or the default value parameter in case key is not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key is null.

      • getBoolean

        default boolean getBoolean(java.lang.String key,
                           boolean value)
        The method queries the boolean value specified by the key .
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        value - the default value to return in case key is not found.
        Returns:
        the value mapped for key in the Config, or the default value parameter in case key is not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key is null.
        ConfigValueConvertException - when there is a value found for the key , but error occur when trying to convert it to a boolean value. See also ConfigSource.hasKey(String) .

      • getBoolean

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.Boolean> getBoolean(java.lang.String key)
        The method queries the Boolean value specified by the key .
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the value mapped for key in the Config, or an empty Optional if it's not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key is null.
        ConfigValueConvertException - when there is a value found for the key , but error occur when trying to convert it to a boolean value. See also ConfigSource.hasKey(String) .

      • getByte

        default byte getByte(java.lang.String key,
                     byte value)
        The method queries the byte value specified by the key .
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        value - the default value to be returned, in case key is not found.
        Returns:
        the byte value found in the Config by the key , or the default value parameter in case key is not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key is null.
        ConfigValueConvertException - if a value is found for the key , but failed when being converted to byte .

      • getValue

        <E> java.util.Optional<E> getValue(java.lang.String key,
                                   Decoder<? extends E,java.lang.String> decoder)
        The method queries the value (of type <E> specified by the key .

        The method is an overloading of getValue(String, org.raistlic.common.codec.Decoder, Object) , and is an equivalent call as getValue(key, decoder, null) .

        Type Parameters:
        E - the concrete type of value to query
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        decoder - the decoder used to convert the value found from String to the required concrete type.
        Returns:
        the value found and converted in the Config by the key , or null in case key is not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key or decoder is null.
        ConfigValueConvertException - if a value is found for the key , but failed when being converted to type <E> .

      • getValue

        default <E> E getValue(java.lang.String key,
                       Decoder<? extends E,java.lang.String> decoder,
                       E value)
        The method queries the value (of type <E> specified by the key .
        Type Parameters:
        E - the concrete type of value to query
        Parameters:
        key - the key to search, cannot be null.
        decoder - the decoder used to convert the value found from String to the required concrete type.
        value - the default value to be returned in case key is not found.
        Returns:
        the value found and converted in the Config by the key , or the parameter value in case key is not found.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when key or decoder is null.
        ConfigValueConvertException - if a value is found for the key , but failed when being converted to type <E> .
